column3: Intro
Q&A: Will there be a feature to allow multiple bases for competitive multiplayer?
Q&A: Are there any plans beyond 1.0?
Q&A: How are you?
Q&A: Do you have a timeline on when you want to start implementing lore? Is it on the near horizon?
Q&A: Is there any possibility it might come to PS4 and Xbox?
Q&A: Are there any hidden parts of the map you think people haven't found?
Q&A: How many likes on this YouTube video for Jace to get fired?
Q&A: Can we get survival features added in a mode for those of us who want more of a challenge?
Q&A: What was your inspiration of making Satisfactory?
Q&A: Will there be a 1:1 Lizard Doggo plushie?
Q&A: Will there be any environmental influences later on, like climate change or heatwave storms?
Q&A: What is the story with the Mercer Sphere?
Q&A: Will there be achievements?
Q&A: Can we use Turbofuel in Jetpacks?
Q&A: Will you add Pipes?
Q&A: Are there any plans to put a blueprint system in the game?
Q&A: What about the giant crab in the trailer, can we get that?
Q&A: Will there be vehicle optimization for co-op?
Q&A: Any plans to make more randomness like resources, start locations, other random world elements?
Q&A: How's life?
Q&A: Will we ever be able to do something with Nuclear Waste?
Q&A: How about water craft or underwater exploration?
Q&A: Any new maps coming?
Q&A: What was the thought process behind the design of the engineer, will we see character creation?
Q&A: What are the community managers' favourite dinosaurs?
Q&A: Is the poisonous gas going to be hallucinogenic?
Q&A: Does this look infected to you?
Q&A: Will there be more optimisation for our low end PCs, both GPU and CPU side?
Q&A: Will you add cheese?
Q&A: Do you plan on adding something like roads, placeable similarly to rails but wider?
Q&A: What about lights or sleeping through the night?
Q&A: What will the next update have?
Q&A: Will there be a Jace poster?
Q&A: Will there be an official peaceful/passive mode?
Q&A: How do you guys feel about an underground biome?
